title: Help with Surf Europe typeface and type treatment
content:
Hello everyone,

I was wondering if any one has any idea what the Surf Europe typeface or something similar is and if there is a typeface that is similar to the Raygun image or do you think that it is just Photoshop treatment.

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [surfeurope\_front\_JPG.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508164100/http:/typophile.com/files/surfeurope_front_JPG.jpg) | 17.66 KB |
| [Raygun.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508164100/http:/typophile.com/files/Raygun.jpg) | 71.46 KB |
author: lmcglone

comments.content: I guess no one can help me out with this one.

[Chalet New York](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508164100/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet/viewfonts) might work for ‘surf’.

And yes. The effect on ‘RAYGUN’ is not in the font.
